info.description: REST API documentation for TraceBack Missing Persons System
info.title: TraceBack API Documentation

post.description: Send verification code to user's email
Reset user's password using verification code
Register a new user with email and password

get.description: Retrieve current user's information
Retrieves a paginated list of all missing persons

post.description: Creates a new missing person report
Handles user queries and provides relevant information about the missing persons system
Compares uploaded image with existing missing person's image

get.description: Retrieves a filtered and paginated list of missing persons based on location and sorting criteria

get.summary: Get Cities by Country and State
get.description: Retrieves list of cities for a specific country and state
Retrieves list of all countries with missing person cases
Retrieves list of states for a specific country
Retrieves a list of all matched persons with optional limit

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.description: Retrieves missing persons from the same state as the logged-in user
Fetches news articles related to a missing person by their name

500.description: Error fetching news from external API

get.description: Retrieves all missing persons reported by the current user
Retrieves all approved matches for the current user's reported persons
Retrieves all pending matches for the current user's reported persons
Retrieves details of a specific matched person case

post.description: Approves a potential match and marks the missing person as found

403.description: User doesn't have permission to approve this match

delete.description: Rejects a potential match for a reported missing person

403.description: User doesn't have permission to reject this match

put.description: Updates details of an existing missing person report including name, image, last seen date, and description

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of missing person to update

400.description: Invalid input data or image validation failed

get.description: Search for missing persons by name or description
Retrieves all successfully matched and approved cases
Retrieves timezone and local time for specific coordinates
Retrieves current weather data for a specific location
Retrieves details of a specific missing person

delete.description: Deletes a specific missing person report

get.description: Retrieves all discussions for a specific missing person case

post.description: Adds a new discussion comment to a missing person case

get.description: Generates a detailed PDF report for a missing person

put.description: Updates the details of the currently logged-in user

get.description: Fetches details of the currently logged-in user
